sqlMap.select: Select t2.*, t3.name as productName, t3.code as productCode, t4.name as providerName From T_CENTER_PRICEASK t1, T_CENTER_PRICEASKPROVIDER t2 , T_CENTER_PRODUCT t3, T_CENTER_PROVIDE t4 Where t2.askId = t1.id and t1.productId = t3.id and t1.productId = #productId# and t4.id = t2.providerId and t1.src = #src# and t1.askDate >= #askDate# and t1.refStock = #stockId#
